author: jfclere
msg: typo.

author: acumiskey
msg: Merged revisions 649279,649283,649285,649393,649396,649420 via svnmerge from
https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/fop/trunk
clone() did not propagate the page's page index.
Throw a useful exception when the user agent isn't set on the renderer. This has been a problem for more than one person setting up their own renderer using FOUserAgent.setRendererOverride().
Split PrintRenderer into PageableRenderer and PrintRenderer (extends PageableRenderer). This allows the use of FOP with JPS. A new example illustrates how this is done.
Removed the code that sets start/end/copies from system properties (now done through renderer options).
Forgot to include in commit for revision 649285.

Introduced PageProductionException and fixed exception throwing for the event related to this exception. It's a RuntimeException descendant as making it a checked exception would have made changes necessary to at least a dozen more classes. Our overall exception style is still not so good.
Fixed build problem. FOPException is no longer thrown there.

author: mkleint
msg: MNG-468 add toolchains support to the javadoc plugin. It recoginizes the "jdk" toolchain now.

author: mkleint
msg: MNG-468 add toolchains support to the compiler plugin. It recoginizes the "jdk" toolchain now. bumped the required version of maven to 2.0.6. Will only actually work in conjunction with maven-toolchains-plugin in 2.0.9+, but the plugin still works without toolchains in older versions (2.0.6+)
needed to excluded the plexus api jar, as it was causing class loading exceptions..

author: mkleint
msg: MNG-468 add toolchains support to the surefire plugin. It recoginizes the "jdk" toolchain now. bumped the required version of maven to 2.0.6. Will only actually work in conjunction with maven-toolchains-plugin in 2.0.9+, but the plugin still works without toolchains in older versions (2.0.6+)
